item.title: British TV Doctor Michael Mosley Found Dead in Greece
item.description: British TV doctor Michael Mosley was found dead in Greece on Monday, according to reports. The 63-year-old, who was best known for his health and diet programs, was reportedly found dead in his hotel room in the Greek island of Ithaca.
